description: Mrs. Edith Renfrow Smith‚ Grinnell College’s first Black alumna. Descended from mid-19th century freedom seekers to Iowa‚ she was born in Grinnell‚ IA and nurtured in a Black extended family. At a vibrant and engaged 110‚ the retired teacher and lifelong volunteer proudly embodies the community spirit of a “true Grinnellian.”
